name: Mayday (itch) (animenerdX3)
description:
It's the Great World War, tensions are high and the desire to live is even higher. Unfortunately for you and a friend, you've been caught in the middle of some crossfire and your ship's going down. What's the plan, captain? Are you going to make your way to the top of the ship together or meet your watery graves?

Joe Tierney - Lead Artist, Level Designer

Peter Gomes - Programmer

Glenndale Bartolome - Narrative

Domenic Calitri - UI Artist

Brandon Millis - UI Artist
